content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":253612,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tなに、くそっ・・と手放した瞬間逃げて行く","translatedEnglishLine":"What, damn it... as soon as I let go, it runs away."},{"lineNumber":253613,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tあっ、しまった、普通でも充分価値あったのに","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, damn, even the normal one had enough value."},{"lineNumber":253614,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tパットン、お前のせいだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Patton, it's your fault."},{"lineNumber":253615,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t兵馬俑のような感じで大量の闘将、聖骸が安置されている","translatedEnglishLine":"Like Terracotta Warriors, a large number of battle generals and sacred remains are enshrined here."},{"lineNumber":253616,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tシーラがパネルを操作して動かす。","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheila operates the panel and activates them."},{"lineNumber":253617,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tここで再度、シーラが魔鉄匠の末裔で唯一　聖魔教団のコントロールパネルを","translatedEnglishLine":"Here again, an explanation that Sheila is the only descendant of the Madetaku smiths who can control the Holy Demon Cult’s control panel."},{"lineNumber":253618,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t操れる存在である事の説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Explanation of her ability to manipulate it."},{"lineNumber":253619,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t１３２体の闘将や聖骸が動くようになった。","translatedEnglishLine":"132 battle generals and sacred remains have started to move."},{"lineNumber":253620,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tおお、これで兵隊が増えていくラッキー","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh, lucky, now our troops are increasing."},{"lineNumber":253621,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tちなみにこれロボットでもモンスターでもなく元は人間だぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"By the way, these aren't robots or monsters—they were originally humans."},{"lineNumber":253622,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tどうする魔人討伐隊のメンバーとして入れるか","translatedEnglishLine":"What should we do? Should we include them as members of the demon extermination squad?"},{"lineNumber":253623,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tうーん、いらん、別働隊として動かした方がいいだろう、ウルザやクリームに預けよう","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, no need. It’s better to use them as a separate unit. Let's entrust them to Ulza and Cream."},{"lineNumber":253624,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tまた兵馬俑の部屋、シーラの力で動かします。","translatedEnglishLine":"Again to the Terracotta Warrior room, Sheila activates them with her power."},{"lineNumber":253625,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t今度は７７体、先程と合わせて２０９体になる","translatedEnglishLine":"This time 77, combined with the previous 132 makes 209."},{"lineNumber":253626,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tこれらも別働隊としてランス城に移動させた。","translatedEnglishLine":"These were also moved to Rance Castle as a separate unit."},{"lineNumber":253627,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tこういうまだ動く闘将や聖骸などが安置されている場所が世界中に何カ所かある","translatedEnglishLine":"There are several places around the world where such still-functioning battle generals and sacred remains are enshrined."},{"lineNumber":253628,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t出来る限りまわって動かしていきたいとシーラ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheila says she wants to visit and activate as many as possible."},{"lineNumber":253629,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tどこかで休憩","translatedEnglishLine":"Take a break somewhere."},{"lineNumber":253630,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t聖魔教団てすごいんだなとランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance: The Holy Demon Cult is really amazing."},{"lineNumber":253631,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t何をいまさらと・・歴史の説明","translatedEnglishLine":"What are you saying now... An explanation of history."},{"lineNumber":253632,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人戦争の流れ、聖魔教団の滅亡","translatedEnglishLine":"The course of the Demon War, and the downfall of the Holy Demon Cult."},{"lineNumber":253633,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t戦力だけで見ると今の人類より強かった、が、負けた。","translatedEnglishLine":"In terms of sheer strength, they were stronger than modern humanity, but they lost."},{"lineNumber":253634,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人を倒す手段が無かったからだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Because they had no means to defeat the demons."},{"lineNumber":253635,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t※このイベントを見までに　聖櫃１−３、闘将１−２をしています","translatedEnglishLine":"*Before seeing this event, you have done Holy Ark 1-3 and Battle General 1-2."},{"lineNumber":253636,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t＞ヌヌハラメモ　第１次魔人戦争","translatedEnglishLine":"> Nunuhara Memo: The First Demon War."},{"lineNumber":253637,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tまた闘将の部屋","translatedEnglishLine":"Back to the Battle General room."},{"lineNumber":253638,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tシーラが解除を行う、手続きは時間がかかる","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheila performs the deactivation; the process takes time."},{"lineNumber":253639,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランスは暇なので待っていたが、いたずら心から真剣な作業をするシーラに","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance, bored while waiting, decides to prank Sheila who is working seriously."},{"lineNumber":253640,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tいたずら・・そしてシーラ失敗","translatedEnglishLine":"Prank... and Sheila fails."},{"lineNumber":253641,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t人類抹殺命令が解除されないままの闘将達が動き出し襲ってくる","translatedEnglishLine":"The battle generals whose humanity extermination orders were not lifted start moving and attack."},{"lineNumber":253642,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tすみませんと詫びるシーラ","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheila apologizes, saying sorry."},{"lineNumber":253643,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tお仕置きだと押し倒して犯そうとした時、","translatedEnglishLine":"When about to punish her by pushing her down and assaulting her,"},{"lineNumber":253644,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランスの真ん前に　あの宝箱だんごがいた、あっ・・目が合う","translatedEnglishLine":"Right in front of Rance was that treasure chest dango; ah... their eyes meet."},{"lineNumber":253645,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tシーラのおっぱいをもみもみすると、それに興味を示している","translatedEnglishLine":"When Sheila's breasts were fondled, it showed interest in that."},{"lineNumber":253646,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tこのデバガメめーと剣をふるうと宝箱だんごは怪我をおって逃げていった","translatedEnglishLine":"Swinging the sword at the little bastard, the treasure chest dango got injured and ran away."},{"lineNumber":253647,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tよし、奴を傷付けたぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, I injured it."},{"lineNumber":253648,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tもうこれまでのように逃げれまい、次は捕まえる","translatedEnglishLine":"It won’t be able to escape like before. Next time, we’ll catch it."},{"lineNumber":253649,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tようやく捕まえられそうだな、ああこれで闘神が仲間に・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Looks like we can finally catch it. Ah, then the battle god will join us..."},{"lineNumber":253650,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tパットンが意味ありげに考え込む","translatedEnglishLine":"Patton thinks deeply with a meaningful expression."},{"lineNumber":253651,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t実は目覚めさせられる闘神ってのは本当は４体いた","translatedEnglishLine":"Actually, there were originally four battle gods that could be awakened."},{"lineNumber":253652,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tなんとまだ２体もいるのか。・・いや他の二体は失敗したんだと。","translatedEnglishLine":"What, there are still two more? No, the other two failed."},{"lineNumber":253653,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tここで説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Explanation here."},{"lineNumber":253654,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tパットン達が行った目覚めさせる為の手段は正しかったが","translatedEnglishLine":"The method Patton and others used to awaken them was correct, but"},{"lineNumber":253655,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tルーンの命令を消去する際に元の人の脳（ミイラ）が","translatedEnglishLine":"When erasing the rune commands, the original person's brain (mummy)"},{"lineNumber":253656,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t負荷に耐えられず破損してしまった","translatedEnglishLine":"could not bear the stress and was damaged."},{"lineNumber":253657,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tなら既に目覚めているあいつ（闘神ゼータ）はどうなんだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Then how about that one already awakened (Battle God Zeta)?"},{"lineNumber":253658,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tあれは元の人物の精神力の強さがあってのもの","translatedEnglishLine":"That was due to the original person's strong willpower."},{"lineNumber":253659,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t今回も上手くいくかは・・。むう","translatedEnglishLine":"Whether this time will succeed... hmm."},{"lineNumber":253660,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tふらふらと傷付いた宝箱だんごが現れる。","translatedEnglishLine":"The injured treasure chest dango appears, staggering."},{"lineNumber":253661,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t追いかけると、通路を曲がってにげていった。","translatedEnglishLine":"When chased, it turned down the corridor and fled."},{"lineNumber":253662,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tよし、追いかけるぞ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, let's chase after it..."},{"lineNumber":253663,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tまって下さい、何か・・すごい圧迫感が・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Wait, something... an overwhelming pressure..."},{"lineNumber":253664,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tこれは・・とハンティは気が付く","translatedEnglishLine":"Hanty realizes, 'This is...'"},{"lineNumber":253665,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t宝箱だんごが逃げた先にいたのは巨大なドラゴン","translatedEnglishLine":"At the place where the treasure chest dango fled was a gigantic dragon."},{"lineNumber":253666,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t闘神都市にはドラゴンが防空兵器として搭載されていた、闘神シグマも同様だった","translatedEnglishLine":"Dragons were mounted as anti-air weapons in the Battle God City, the same for Battle God Sigma."},{"lineNumber":253667,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tが、この闘神都市が魔人に落とされた際に、格納庫にいた六体のドラゴンは一緒に","translatedEnglishLine":"However, when this Battle God City was captured by demons, the six dragons in the hangar were"},{"lineNumber":253668,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t潰されてしまった、が、生命力の強いドラゴンは圧死する事なく６体が奇妙に合体","translatedEnglishLine":"crushed along with it, but six dragons with strong vitality strangely fused together without being crushed to death."},{"lineNumber":253669,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tそして気が狂った。","translatedEnglishLine":"And then they went mad."},{"lineNumber":253670,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tクレイジードラゴンが居る","translatedEnglishLine":"There is a Crazy Dragon."},{"lineNumber":253671,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tキャンテルのような存在だったのだが、今は狂っている、話が通じない","translatedEnglishLine":"It was once like Cantel, but now it's insane and can't be reasoned with."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なに、くそっ・・と手放した瞬間逃げて行く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What, damn it... as soon as I let go, it runs away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、しまった、普通でも充分価値あったのに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, damn, even the normal one had enough value.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パットン、お前のせいだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Patton, it's your fault.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵馬俑のような感じで大量の闘将、聖骸が安置されている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Like Terracotta Warriors, a large number of battle generals and sacred remains are enshrined here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラがパネルを操作して動かす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheila operates the panel and activates them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここで再度、シーラが魔鉄匠の末裔で唯一　聖魔教団のコントロールパネルを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here again, an explanation that Sheila is the only descendant of the Madetaku smiths who can control the Holy Demon Cult’s control panel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 操れる存在である事の説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanation of her ability to manipulate it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １３２体の闘将や聖骸が動くようになった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 132 battle generals and sacred remains have started to move.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おお、これで兵隊が増えていくラッキー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, lucky, now our troops are increasing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちなみにこれロボットでもモンスターでもなく元は人間だぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, these aren't robots or monsters—they were originally humans.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうする魔人討伐隊のメンバーとして入れるか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What should we do? Should we include them as members of the demon extermination squad?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うーん、いらん、別働隊として動かした方がいいだろう、ウルザやクリームに預けよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, no need. It’s better to use them as a separate unit. Let's entrust them to Ulza and Cream.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また兵馬俑の部屋、シーラの力で動かします。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Again to the Terracotta Warrior room, Sheila activates them with her power.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今度は７７体、先程と合わせて２０９体になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This time 77, combined with the previous 132 makes 209.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これらも別働隊としてランス城に移動させた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: These were also moved to Rance Castle as a separate unit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こういうまだ動く闘将や聖骸などが安置されている場所が世界中に何カ所かある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are several places around the world where such still-functioning battle generals and sacred remains are enshrined.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出来る限りまわって動かしていきたいとシーラ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheila says she wants to visit and activate as many as possible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこかで休憩
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Take a break somewhere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聖魔教団てすごいんだなとランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance: The Holy Demon Cult is really amazing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何をいまさらと・・歴史の説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What are you saying now... An explanation of history.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人戦争の流れ、聖魔教団の滅亡
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The course of the Demon War, and the downfall of the Holy Demon Cult.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦力だけで見ると今の人類より強かった、が、負けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In terms of sheer strength, they were stronger than modern humanity, but they lost.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人を倒す手段が無かったからだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because they had no means to defeat the demons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※このイベントを見までに　聖櫃１−３、闘将１−２をしています
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *Before seeing this event, you have done Holy Ark 1-3 and Battle General 1-2.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞ヌヌハラメモ　第１次魔人戦争
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Nunuhara Memo: The First Demon War.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また闘将の部屋
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Back to the Battle General room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラが解除を行う、手続きは時間がかかる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheila performs the deactivation; the process takes time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは暇なので待っていたが、いたずら心から真剣な作業をするシーラに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, bored while waiting, decides to prank Sheila who is working seriously.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いたずら・・そしてシーラ失敗
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Prank... and Sheila fails.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類抹殺命令が解除されないままの闘将達が動き出し襲ってくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle generals whose humanity extermination orders were not lifted start moving and attack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すみませんと詫びるシーラ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheila apologizes, saying sorry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お仕置きだと押し倒して犯そうとした時、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When about to punish her by pushing her down and assaulting her,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの真ん前に　あの宝箱だんごがいた、あっ・・目が合う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Right in front of Rance was that treasure chest dango; ah... their eyes meet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラのおっぱいをもみもみすると、それに興味を示している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Sheila's breasts were fondled, it showed interest in that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このデバガメめーと剣をふるうと宝箱だんごは怪我をおって逃げていった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Swinging the sword at the little bastard, the treasure chest dango got injured and ran away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、奴を傷付けたぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, I injured it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もうこれまでのように逃げれまい、次は捕まえる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It won’t be able to escape like before. Next time, we’ll catch it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ようやく捕まえられそうだな、ああこれで闘神が仲間に・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looks like we can finally catch it. Ah, then the battle god will join us...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パットンが意味ありげに考え込む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Patton thinks deeply with a meaningful expression.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実は目覚めさせられる闘神ってのは本当は４体いた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Actually, there were originally four battle gods that could be awakened.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとまだ２体もいるのか。・・いや他の二体は失敗したんだと。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What, there are still two more? No, the other two failed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここで説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanation here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パットン達が行った目覚めさせる為の手段は正しかったが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The method Patton and others used to awaken them was correct, but

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ルーンの命令を消去する際に元の人の脳（ミイラ）が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When erasing the rune commands, the original person's brain (mummy)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 負荷に耐えられず破損してしまった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: could not bear the stress and was damaged.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なら既に目覚めているあいつ（闘神ゼータ）はどうなんだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then how about that one already awakened (Battle God Zeta)?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれは元の人物の精神力の強さがあってのもの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was due to the original person's strong willpower.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回も上手くいくかは・・。むう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whether this time will succeed... hmm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふらふらと傷付いた宝箱だんごが現れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The injured treasure chest dango appears, staggering.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 追いかけると、通路を曲がってにげていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When chased, it turned down the corridor and fled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、追いかけるぞ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's chase after it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まって下さい、何か・・すごい圧迫感が・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait, something... an overwhelming pressure...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは・・とハンティは気が付く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hanty realizes, 'This is...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 宝箱だんごが逃げた先にいたのは巨大なドラゴン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the place where the treasure chest dango fled was a gigantic dragon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神都市にはドラゴンが防空兵器として搭載されていた、闘神シグマも同様だった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dragons were mounted as anti-air weapons in the Battle God City, the same for Battle God Sigma.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、この闘神都市が魔人に落とされた際に、格納庫にいた六体のドラゴンは一緒に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, when this Battle God City was captured by demons, the six dragons in the hangar were

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 潰されてしまった、が、生命力の強いドラゴンは圧死する事なく６体が奇妙に合体
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: crushed along with it, but six dragons with strong vitality strangely fused together without being crushed to death.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして気が狂った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then they went mad.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クレイジードラゴンが居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is a Crazy Dragon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キャンテルのような存在だったのだが、今は狂っている、話が通じない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was once like Cantel, but now it's insane and can't be reasoned with.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

Should we include them as members of the demon extermination squad?"},{"lineNumber":253623,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tうーん、いらん、別働隊として動かした方がいいだろう、ウルザやクリームに預けよう","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, no need. It’s better to use them as a separate unit. Let's entrust them to Ulza and Cream."},{"lineNumber":253624,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tまた兵馬俑の部屋、シーラの力で動かします。","translatedEnglishLine":"Again to the Terracotta Warrior room, Sheila activates them with her power."},{"lineNumber":253625,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t今度は７７体、先程と合わせて２０９体になる","translatedEnglishLine":"This time 77, combined with the previous 132 makes 209."},{"lineNumber":253626,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tこれらも別働隊としてランス城に移動させた。","translatedEnglishLine":"These were also moved to Rance Castle as a separate unit."},{"lineNumber":253627,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tこういうまだ動く闘将や聖骸などが安置されている場所が世界中に何カ所かある","translatedEnglishLine":"There are several places around the world where such still-functioning battle generals and sacred remains are enshrined."},{"lineNumber":253628,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t出来る限りまわって動かしていきたいとシーラ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheila says she wants to visit and activate as many as possible."},{"lineNumber":253629,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tどこかで休憩","translatedEnglishLine":"Take a break somewhere."},{"lineNumber":253630,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t聖魔教団てすごいんだなとランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance: The Holy Demon Cult is really amazing."},{"lineNumber":253631,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t何をいまさらと・・歴史の説明","translatedEnglishLine":"What are you saying now... An explanation of history."},{"lineNumber":253632,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人戦争の流れ、聖魔教団の滅亡","translatedEnglishLine":"The course of the Demon War, and the downfall of the Holy Demon Cult."},{"lineNumber":253633,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t戦力だけで見ると今の人類より強かった、が、負けた。","translatedEnglishLine":"In terms of sheer strength, they were stronger than modern humanity, but they lost."},{"lineNumber":253634,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人を倒す手段が無かったからだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Because they had no means to defeat the demons."},{"lineNumber":253635,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t※このイベントを見までに　聖櫃１−３、闘将１−２をしています","translatedEnglishLine":"*Before seeing this event, you have done Holy Ark 1-3 and Battle General 1-2."},{"lineNumber":253636,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t＞ヌヌハラメモ　第１次魔人戦争","translatedEnglishLine":"> Nunuhara Memo: The First Demon War."},{"lineNumber":253637,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tまた闘将の部屋","translatedEnglishLine":"Back to the Battle General room."},{"lineNumber":253638,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tシーラが解除を行う、手続きは時間がかかる","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheila performs the deactivation; the process takes time."},{"lineNumber":253639,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランスは暇なので待っていたが、いたずら心から真剣な作業をするシーラに","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance, bored while waiting, decides to prank Sheila who is working seriously."},{"lineNumber":253640,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tいたずら・・そしてシーラ失敗","translatedEnglishLine":"Prank... and Sheila fails."},{"lineNumber":253641,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t人類抹殺命令が解除されないままの闘将達が動き出し襲ってくる","translatedEnglishLine":"The battle generals whose humanity extermination orders were not lifted start moving and attack."},{"lineNumber":253642,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tすみませんと詫びるシーラ","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheila apologizes, saying sorry."},{"lineNumber":253643,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tお仕置きだと押し倒して犯そうとした時、","translatedEnglishLine":"When about to punish her by pushing her down and assaulting her,"},{"lineNumber":253644,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランスの真ん前に　あの宝箱だんごがいた、あっ・・目が合う","translatedEnglishLine":"Right in front of Rance was that treasure chest dango; ah... their eyes meet."},{"lineNumber":253645,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tシーラのおっぱいをもみもみすると、それに興味を示している","translatedEnglishLine":"When Sheila's breasts were fondled, it showed interest in that."},{"lineNumber":253646,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tこのデバガメめーと剣をふるうと宝箱だんごは怪我をおって逃げていった","translatedEnglishLine":"Swinging the sword at the little bastard, the treasure chest dango got injured and ran away."},{"lineNumber":253647,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tよし、奴を傷付けたぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, I injured it."},{"lineNumber":253648,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tもうこれまでのように逃げれまい、次は捕まえる","translatedEnglishLine":"It won’t be able to escape like before. Next time, we’ll catch it."},{"lineNumber":253649,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tようやく捕まえられそうだな、ああこれで闘神が仲間に・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Looks like we can finally catch it. Ah, then the battle god will join us..."},{"lineNumber":253650,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tパットンが意味ありげに考え込む","translatedEnglishLine":"Patton thinks deeply with a meaningful expression."},{"lineNumber":253651,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t実は目覚めさせられる闘神ってのは本当は４体いた","translatedEnglishLine":"Actually, there were originally four battle gods that could be awakened."},{"lineNumber":253652,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tなんとまだ２体もいるのか。・・いや他の二体は失敗したんだと。","translatedEnglishLine":"What, there are still two more? translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なに、くそっ・・と手放した瞬間逃げて行く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What, damn it... as soon as I let go, it runs away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、しまった、普通でも充分価値あったのに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, damn, even the normal one had enough value.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パットン、お前のせいだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Patton, it's your fault.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵馬俑のような感じで大量の闘将、聖骸が安置されている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Like Terracotta Warriors, a large number of battle generals and sacred remains are enshrined here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラがパネルを操作して動かす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheila operates the panel and activates them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここで再度、シーラが魔鉄匠の末裔で唯一　聖魔教団のコントロールパネルを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here again, an explanation that Sheila is the only descendant of the Madetaku smiths who can control the Holy Demon Cult’s control panel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 操れる存在である事の説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanation of her ability to manipulate it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １３２体の闘将や聖骸が動くようになった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 132 battle generals and sacred remains have started to move.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おお、これで兵隊が増えていくラッキー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, lucky, now our troops are increasing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちなみにこれロボットでもモンスターでもなく元は人間だぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, these aren't robots or monsters—they were originally humans.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうする魔人討伐隊のメンバーとして入れるか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What should we do? Should we include them as members of the demon extermination squad?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うーん、いらん、別働隊として動かした方がいいだろう、ウルザやクリームに預けよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, no need. It’s better to use them as a separate unit. Let's entrust them to Ulza and Cream.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また兵馬俑の部屋、シーラの力で動かします。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Again to the Terracotta Warrior room, Sheila activates them with her power.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今度は７７体、先程と合わせて２０９体になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This time 77, combined with the previous 132 makes 209.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これらも別働隊としてランス城に移動させた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: These were also moved to Rance Castle as a separate unit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こういうまだ動く闘将や聖骸などが安置されている場所が世界中に何カ所かある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are several places around the world where such still-functioning battle generals and sacred remains are enshrined.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出来る限りまわって動かしていきたいとシーラ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheila says she wants to visit and activate as many as possible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこかで休憩
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Take a break somewhere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聖魔教団てすごいんだなとランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance: The Holy Demon Cult is really amazing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何をいまさらと・・歴史の説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What are you saying now... An explanation of history.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人戦争の流れ、聖魔教団の滅亡
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The course of the Demon War, and the downfall of the Holy Demon Cult.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦力だけで見ると今の人類より強かった、が、負けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In terms of sheer strength, they were stronger than modern humanity, but they lost.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人を倒す手段が無かったからだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because they had no means to defeat the demons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※このイベントを見までに　聖櫃１−３、闘将１−２をしています
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *Before seeing this event, you have done Holy Ark 1-3 and Battle General 1-2.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞ヌヌハラメモ　第１次魔人戦争
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Nunuhara Memo: The First Demon War.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また闘将の部屋
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Back to the Battle General room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラが解除を行う、手続きは時間がかかる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheila performs the deactivation; the process takes time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは暇なので待っていたが、いたずら心から真剣な作業をするシーラに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, bored while waiting, decides to prank Sheila who is working seriously.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いたずら・・そしてシーラ失敗
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Prank... and Sheila fails.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類抹殺命令が解除されないままの闘将達が動き出し襲ってくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle generals whose humanity extermination orders were not lifted start moving and attack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すみませんと詫びるシーラ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheila apologizes, saying sorry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お仕置きだと押し倒して犯そうとした時、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When about to punish her by pushing her down and assaulting her,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの真ん前に　あの宝箱だんごがいた、あっ・・目が合う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Right in front of Rance was that treasure chest dango; ah... their eyes meet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラのおっぱいをもみもみすると、それに興味を示している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Sheila's breasts were fondled, it showed interest in that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このデバガメめーと剣をふるうと宝箱だんごは怪我をおって逃げていった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Swinging the sword at the little bastard, the treasure chest dango got injured and ran away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、奴を傷付けたぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, I injured it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もうこれまでのように逃げれまい、次は捕まえる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It won’t be able to escape like before. Next time, we’ll catch it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ようやく捕まえられそうだな、ああこれで闘神が仲間に・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looks like we can finally catch it. Ah, then the battle god will join us...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パットンが意味ありげに考え込む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Patton thinks deeply with a meaningful expression.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実は目覚めさせられる闘神ってのは本当は４体いた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Actually, there were originally four battle gods that could be awakened.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとまだ２体もいるのか。・・いや他の二体は失敗したんだと。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What, there are still two more? No, the other two failed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここで説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanation here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パットン達が行った目覚めさせる為の手段は正しかったが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The method Patton and others used to awaken them was correct, but

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ルーンの命令を消去する際に元の人の脳（ミイラ）が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When erasing the rune commands, the original person's brain (mummy)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 負荷に耐えられず破損してしまった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: could not bear the stress and was damaged.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なら既に目覚めているあいつ（闘神ゼータ）はどうなんだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then how about that one already awakened (Battle God Zeta)?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれは元の人物の精神力の強さがあってのもの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was due to the original person's strong willpower.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回も上手くいくかは・・。むう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whether this time will succeed... hmm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふらふらと傷付いた宝箱だんごが現れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The injured treasure chest dango appears, staggering.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 追いかけると、通路を曲がってにげていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When chased, it turned down the corridor and fled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、追いかけるぞ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's chase after it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まって下さい、何か・・すごい圧迫感が・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait, something... an overwhelming pressure...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは・・とハンティは気が付く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hanty realizes, 'This is...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 宝箱だんごが逃げた先にいたのは巨大なドラゴン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the place where the treasure chest dango fled was a gigantic dragon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神都市にはドラゴンが防空兵器として搭載されていた、闘神シグマも同様だった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dragons were mounted as anti-air weapons in the Battle God City, the same for Battle God Sigma.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、この闘神都市が魔人に落とされた際に、格納庫にいた六体のドラゴンは一緒に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, when this Battle God City was captured by demons, the six dragons in the hangar were

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 潰されてしまった、が、生命力の強いドラゴンは圧死する事なく６体が奇妙に合体
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: crushed along with it, but six dragons with strong vitality strangely fused together without being crushed to death.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして気が狂った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then they went mad.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クレイジードラゴンが居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is a Crazy Dragon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キャンテルのような存在だったのだが、今は狂っている、話が通じない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was once like Cantel, but now it's insane and can't be reasoned with.
